content: to reciprocate the warm support we have gotten from everyone the past 18 months tiny rabbit hole is sharing this free tokidoki unicorno amigurumi pattern with everyone let s join hands together to bring more unicorns into existence detailed pattern with step-by-step instructions can be found here 1 **help** learn basic crochet techniques by visiting our beginner videos 2 if you require help contact us at facebook 3 / instagram 4 / contact us 5 1 https //blog tinyrabbithole com/tokidoki-unicorno-featuring-stellina-free-amigurumi-pattern/ 2 https //tinyrabbithole com/pages/learn 3 https //www facebook com/tinyrabbithole 4 http //www instagram com/tinyrabbithole 5 https //tinyrabbithole com/pages/contact
